author: Charlie Spiering, Charlie Spiering
title: Donald Trump Discusses Defeating Coronavirus with China's President Xi Jinping
description: President Donald Trump on Thursday spoke with Chinese President Xi Jinping about fighting the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
President Donald Trump on Thursday spoke with Chinese President Xi Jinping about the global coronavirus pandemic.
“Just finished a very good conversation with President Xi of China,” Trump wrote on Twitter after the call. “Discussed in great detail the Coron… [+1385 chars]
